name: Golf Training and Coaching
description:
Learn the GOLF with passion.
Golf Training present the v1.0 of Golf training & coaching for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the GOLF diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots
* Tee Shot
* Fairway Shot
* Bunker Shot
* Flop Shot
* Chip Shot and much more.
Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after watching these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO Golfer.
Application contains HD videos that contains coaching and practice stuff for beginners as well.
Download and enjoy.
